Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.animation

Class Timeline<T extends Frame<T>>

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.animation.Timeline<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,T>>
public final class Timeline<T extends Frame<T>> extends Object implements Iterable<Map.Entry<Integer,T>>
A collection of keyframe Frames at specific offsets, returning interpolated frames at any offsets between 0 and size().

  • Constructor Details

    • Timeline

      public Timeline()

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int offset)
      Returns whether this timeline has a keyframe at offset.

    • put

      public void put(int offset, T frame)
      Sets the keyframe frame at offset, replacing any previously set keyframe at that point. offset must be >= 0.

    • remove

      public T remove(int offset)
      Removes the keyframe at offset and returns it, if any. Throws IllegalArgumentException if offset is less than 0 or greater than size().

    • get

      public T get(int offset)
      Returns the frame at offset. Offsets between keyframes return frames interpolated from the 2 adjacent keyframes. Throws IllegalArgumentException if offset is less than 0 or greater than size().

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the maximum supported offset - equivalent to the last keyframe. Returns -1 if there are no keyframes.

    • iterator

      public Iterator<Map.Entry<Integer,T>> iterator()
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<T extends Frame<T>>
